attributes.action: Stop the destruction of rain forests for the provision of Bio-fuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the major introduction of bio-fuels, that are destroying the rain forests. These are cut down at a rate of 1000 hectres a day to plant Palm trees for bio-fuels.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Biofuel-caution/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
